definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. large smelting furnace/fig. the mixing of different ethnicities and cultures/Melting Pot
common erroneous form of 朱鎔基|朱镕基, Zhu Rongji (1928-), PRC politician, premier 1998-2003

sentences.english: Structure of laser cladded Ni-based alloy coating .
sentences.chinese: 镍合金激光熔覆层的组织结构分析。

sentences.english: The replicas are made by using a thin film of fusible alloy on a stiffening platen .
sentences.chinese: 复制是用附着在加强托板上的可熔合金薄膜实现的。

sentences.english: The Fe-Cu laser cladded coating has excellent wear resistance after aging treatment.
sentences.chinese: 熔覆层在时效以后可获得较高的耐磨性能。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the optimum technical conditions and characteristics of wire explosion spraying.
sentences.chinese: 介绍线爆熔射法的最佳技术条件及特点。

sentences.english: "Gathering essence, creating classical"is persistent pursuing aim.
sentences.chinese: “皆熔精华，鼎铸经典”是本厂坚持不渝的追求目标。

sentences.english: The statue was melted into a cannon.
sentences.chinese: 铸像被熔成为一尊大炮。

sentences.english: But if we heat it in a furnace it will melt and become a liquid .
sentences.chinese: 但如果放到熔铁炉内加热，它就会熔化成为液体。

sentences.english: Some suggestions of resolving the problem of cracking in laser cladding layer were propounded.
sentences.chinese: 对解决熔覆层开裂问题提出了一些建议。

sentences.english: I choose melt into the stove to change into the boiling hot molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 我选择熔入炉中化为滚烫的钢水。

sentences.english: Expendable thermocouples are expendable probes immersed in molten steel to measure temperature.
sentences.chinese: 消耗型热电偶可测量熔金属中的温度。

sentences.english: This paper attempts to review the effect on FZ monocrystalline silicon by annealing.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了热处理对辐照区熔硅单晶的影响。

sentences.english: Applications of laser melting and cladding to hot rolls .
sentences.chinese: 激光熔凝和熔敷在热轧辊强化中的应用。

sentences.english: In this paper, growth and recrystallization of silicon films on ceramic substrates were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了陶瓷衬底上多晶硅薄膜的生长和区熔再结晶。

sentences.english: We can fuse the various ingredients into glass.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以把各种成分熔合成玻璃。

sentences.english: The B4C ceramic particle not melted in cladding layer.
sentences.chinese: 熔覆层中出现未熔的B4C陶瓷颗粒。

definition: to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
